title: One Piece Episode 357 Recap
author: [swim squad]
description: Detailed recap of Episode 357 covering Usopp vs Perona, Brook vs Ryuma, Oars' rampage, and Sanji's arrival at the wedding chapel. Rated 4/5 rudder-pulling giants.

title: ZORO SAVES BROOK FROM RYUMA | One Piece Episode 357 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown
description: Couples reaction video to One Piece Episode 357 focusing on Zoro's arrival to save Brook from Ryuma and the reveal of Shusui.

title: One Piece Episode 357 Reaction - Thriller Bark Adventures!
author: Jaysen (@ezeekat)
description: TikTok reaction video covering Episode 357 of the Thriller Bark arc.

title: 356-357: "Usopp's the Strongest? Leave Anything Negative to Him" & "The General Zombies Are Down in a Flash!! Oars Feels Like an Adventure!!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Combined recap and discussion of Episodes 356-357, focusing on Usopp's fight with Perona and the unique nature of his negativity as a counter to her powers.

title: One Piece Episodes: 357-361 Coverage
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Podcast coverage of One Piece episodes 357-361 as part of the Thriller Bark arc. Features 3 friends diving deep into One Piece with 2 experiencing the show for the first time.

title: Episode 357 | One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 357 containing episode details, plot summary, character appearances, manga chapters adapted, and production credits.

title: Shusui | One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed wiki article about Shusui, the legendary black blade introduced in this episode, including its history, significance to Wano Country, and connection to Zoro.

title: Shimotsuki Ryuma | One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive article about Ryuma, the legendary samurai from Wano Country, including his history as a dragon slayer, connection to Zoro, and role as a zombie in Thriller Bark.

title: How did Zoro get Shusui?
author: TrueKatana
description: Article explaining how Zoro obtained Shusui from Ryuma during the Thriller Bark arc and the sword's significance.

title: One Piece: The Life of The Legendary Samurai Ryuma
author: Game Rant
description: Deep dive article about Ryuma's history as the legendary 'Sword God' of Wano Country, his feat of slaying a dragon, and his appearance in Thriller Bark.

title: Horo Horo no Mi | One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki article about Perona's Hollow-Hollow Fruit Devil Fruit, including its abilities, weaknesses, and techniques like the Quadruple Negative Attack.

author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Complete wiki article about the Thriller Bark arc, providing context for Episode 357 within the larger story arc.
